hero.title: Classic Grooming for the Modern Gentleman
hero.subtitle: Experience the art of traditional barbering in a relaxed, premium atmosphere. We don't just cut hair, we cultivate style.

intro.title:
Quality is Pride
of Workmanship
intro.text: At Silla Barber Shop, we believe that a haircut is not just a service—it's an experience. Our master barbers blend traditional techniques with modern trends to create a look that is uniquely yours. From hot towel shaves to precision fades, we take pride in every detail.

descriptions.lele: Master of the blade with over 15 years of experience. Specializes in classic cuts and hot towel shaves.
descriptions.riccardo: Modern stylist with a flair for contemporary trends. Expert in fading and texturizing.
descriptions.jurgen: Precise and attentive, Jurgen brings a fresh perspective to traditional barbering.
descriptions.stefano: Rising star with a passion for learning and perfecting his craft.

reviews.title: Reviews
reviews.review_1: Serious, prepared and reliable. A true Barber where you find every men's service done impeccably. Recommended.
reviews.review_2: Great service, really kind staff, I came here after a home experiment went wrong. They know how to put you at ease, you can also book from the site.
reviews.review_3: Speed, punctuality, attention to detail and skill at an honest price!
reviews.review_4: It had been about 4 years since I went to a barber... struck by the professional service and comfortable environment... The guys managed to advise me on the right cut... I will definitely return!
reviews.review_5: TOP Barber Shop. Very elegant, bright and above all clean. The owner Emanuele Silla together with the guys Riccardo and Stefano are true professionals... I highly recommend coming here!
reviews.review_6: Kind, always smiling, available, but above all good! In particular Stefano really knows how to deal with children!

products.title: Products and Gifts
products.text: Take the Silla experience home with you. We offer a curated selection of premium grooming products, from pomades and beard oils to safety razors and gift sets. Perfect for maintaining your look between visits or as a thoughtful gift for a gentleman.

coffee.title: Relax Area
coffee.text: It's not just about the cut, it's about the entire experience. Arrive a bit early or stay after to unwind in our dedicated lounge. A moment to disconnect, read, or simply enjoy the atmosphere of our barber shop. Your well-being is our priority.
